sentences.sContent: The connexion is not a simple derivation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The connexion is not a simple derivation.
sentences.sCn: 这种连接并不只是衍生性的。

sentences.sContent: Syntactics is a subject to study abstract formal connexion among the signs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Syntactics is a subject to study abstract formal connexion among the signs.
sentences.sCn: 符号学是研究符号之间的抽象形式联系的学科。

sentences.sContent: Frequently consider the connexion of all things in the universe and their relation to one another.
sentences.sContent_eng: Frequently consider the connexion of all things in the universe and their relation to one another.
sentences.sCn: 经常考虑宇宙中所有事物的联系和它们的相互关系。
